name: Wordstrap
body:
# Features
* A complete Theme Options page to easily customize your site.
* Choose between 4 common layouts: full-width, 2 columns with right or left sidebar or three columns.
* An special auth system which enables you to display all login and forget password procedures in the sidebar or even the top navigation bar.
* All the code has been segmentated into "partials" for a better understanding of the code and to allow developers extend the possibilities of the theme, which all the powerfull features brought by bootstrap.
tagline: Wordstrap. A wordpress theme using bootstrap.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
